verses.verse: Thus all<WH3605> the work<WH4399> that Solomon<WH8010> performed<WH6213> for the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068> was finished.<WH9608> And Solomon<WH8010> brought<WH935> in the things that David<WH1732> his father had dedicated,<WH1> even the silver<WH6944> and the gold<WH3701> and all<WH2091> the utensils,<WH3605> [and] put<WH3627> [them] in the treasuries<WH5414> of the house<WH214> of God.<WH1004>

Then<WH227> Solomon<WH8010> assembled<WH6950> to Jerusalem<WH3389> the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> and all<WH3605> the heads<WH7218> of the tribes,<WH4294> the leaders<WH5387> of the fathers' [households] of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> to bring<WH5927> up the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the Lord<WH3068> out of the city<WH5892> of David,<WH1732> which<WH1931> is Zion.<WH6726>
And all<WH3605> the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> assembled<WH6950> themselves to the king<WH4428> at the feast,<WH2282> that is [in] the seventh<WH7637> month.<WH2320>
Then all<WH3605> the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> came,<WH935> and the Levites<WH3881> took<WH5375> up the ark.<WH727>

And they brought<WH5927> up the ark<WH727> and the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> and all<WH3605> the holy<WH6944> utensils<WH3627> which<WH834> [were] in the tent;<WH168> the Levitical<WH3881> priests<WH3548> brought<WH5927> them up.

And King<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> and all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of Israel<WH3478> who were assembled<WH3259> with him before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> were sacrificing<WH2076> so many<WH7230> sheep<WH6629> and oxen,<WH1241> that they could not be counted<WH5608> or numbered.<WH4487>

Then the priests<WH3548> brought<WH935> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the Lord<WH3068> to its place,<WH4725> into the inner<WH1687> sanctuary<WH1687> of the house,<WH1004> to the holy<WH6944> of holies,<WH6944> under<WH8478> the wings<WH3671> of the cherubim.<WH3742>

For the cherubim<WH3742> spread<WH6566> their wings<WH3671> over<WH5921> the place<WH4725> of the ark,<WH727> so that the cherubim<WH3742> made<WH3680> a covering<WH3680> over<WH5921> the ark<WH727> and its poles.<WH905>

And the poles<WH905> were so long<WH748> that the ends<WH7218> of the poles<WH905> of the ark<WH727> could be seen<WH7200> in front<WH6440> of the inner<WH1687> sanctuary,<WH1687> but they could not be seen<WH7200> outside;<WH2351> and they are there<WH8033> to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

There<WH369> was nothing<WH369> in the ark<WH727> except<WH7534> the two<WH8147> tablets<WH3871> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> put<WH5414> [there] at Horeb,<WH2722> where<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> made<WH3772> a covenant with the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> when they came<WH3318> out of Egypt.<WH4714>

And when the priests<WH3548> came<WH3318> forth<WH3318> from the holy<WH6944> place (for all<WH3605> the priests<WH3548> who were present<WH4672> had sanctified<WH6942> themselves, without<WH369> regard<WH8104> to divisions<WH4256>),

and all<WH3605> the Levitical<WH3881> singers,<WH7891> Asaph,<WH623> Heman,<WH1968> Jeduthun,<WH3038> and their sons<WH1121> and kinsmen,<WH251> clothed<WH3847> in fine<WH948> linen,<WH948> with cymbals,<WH4700> harps,<WH5035> and lyres,<WH3658> standing<WH5975> east<WH4217> of the altar,<WH4196> and with them one hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> priests<WH3548> blowing<WH2690> trumpets<WH2689>

in unison<WH259> when the trumpeters<WH2689> and the singers<WH7891> were to make<WH8085> themselves heard<WH8085> with one<WH259> voice<WH6963> to praise<WH1984> and to glorify<WH3034> the Lord,<WH3068> and when they lifted<WH7311> up their voice<WH6963> accompanied by trumpets<WH2689> and cymbals<WH4700> and instruments<WH3627> of music,<WH7892> and when they praised<WH1984> the Lord<WH3068> [saying, "][He] indeed<WH3588> is good<WH2896> for His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769>" then the house,<WH1004> the house<WH1004> of the Lord,<WH3068> was filled<WH4390> with a cloud,<WH6051>

so that the priests<WH3548> could<WH3201> not stand<WH5975> to minister<WH8334> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the cloud,<WH6051> for the glory<WH9202> of the Lord<WH3068> filled<WH4390> the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>
